languages.text: {n}Ваши слова заставляют гостей отвести взгляды, но атмосфера всеобщей нервозности не исчезает — теперь каждый из офицеров напряженно слушает, ловя шорох каждого движения Кибеллы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваши слова заставляют гостей вновь повернуться к своим собеседникам, однако ощущение насмешливого внимания не покидает вас — похоже, скандализированные гости просто наблюдают за вами изподтишка. Кибелла, водящая кончиком ножа по начерченному лабиринту, не уделяет остальным и крохи внимания.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова заставляют гостей отвести взгляды, но атмосфера всеобщей нервозности не исчезает — теперь каждый из офицеров напряженно слушает, ловя шорох каждого движения Кибеллы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words frighten away the guests' looks, but there is still a permeating sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

{n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}
{n}Your words frighten away the guests' judgmental looks, but you can still hear some muffled scandalised whispers.{/n}

{n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

{n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras espantan las miradas sentenciosas de los invitados, pero aún permanece una sensación de recelo en el aire: es como si todos los oficiales hubieran agudizado su oído para notar cualquier movimiento de Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras espantan las miradas sentenciosas de los invitados, pero aún permanece una sensación de recelo en el aire: es como si todos los oficiales hubieran agudizado su oído para notar cualquier movimiento de Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に他の出席者は視線をそらしたが、空気にはまだ不安が残っていた。士官たちは皆、キベラのわずかな動きを察知しようと、聴覚を研ぎ澄ませているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に他の出席者は視線をそらしたが、空気にはまだ不安が残っていた。士官たちは皆、キベラのわずかな動きを察知しようと、聴覚を研ぎ澄ませているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的话语迫使参加聚会的其他军官移开了视线，但空气中依然残留着挥之不去的恐惧感，所有军官似乎都在努力聆听着绮贝菈最细微的动作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话语迫使参加聚会的其他军官移开了视线，但空气中依然残留着挥之不去的恐惧感，所有军官似乎都在努力聆听着绮贝菈最细微的动作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte zwingen die übrigen Anwesenden, ihre Blicke abzuwenden, aber noch immer herrscht eine angespannte Atmosphäre ... alle Offiziere scheinen nun auf ihr Gehör zu vertrauen, um jede noch so kleine Bewegung von Kibellah zu bemerken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte zwingen die übrigen Anwesenden, ihre Blicke abzuwenden, aber noch immer herrscht eine angespannte Atmosphäre ... alle Offiziere scheinen nun auf ihr Gehör zu vertrauen, um jede noch so kleine Bewegung von Kibellah zu bemerken.

languages.text: {n}Si votre intervention pousse les autres convives à détourner le regard, la tension qui flotte dans l'air demeure palpable et tous les officiers semblent tendre l'oreille comme pour suivre à la trace les moindres faits et gestes de Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin, diğer katılımcıları bakışlarını kaçırmaya zorluyor. Ancak geçmek bilmeyen bir endişe hissi havada asılı kalıyor. Tüm subaylar, şimdi kulakları dikilmiş bir hâlde Kibellah'nın en ufak bir hareketini bile algılamaya çalışır gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words force the other attendees to avert their gazes, but there is still a lingering sense of apprehension in the air — every officer now appears to be straining their hearing to detect Kibellah's slightest movements.{/n}
